thread.section_title: The Express Tribune
thread.title: West Ham appoint David Moyes as new manager
thread.title_full: West Ham appoint David Moyes as new manager

posts.author: AFP
posts.title: West Ham appoint David Moyes as new manager
posts.text:
Share Tweet Email PHOTO: AFP 
LONDON: West Ham have appointed former Everton and Manchester United boss David Moyes as their new manager, the struggling Premier League club announced on Tuesday. 
“We believe David is the right man to turn things around and get the best out of the players at the club,” joint chairman David Sullivan said. 
The Hammers sacked manager Slaven Bilic on Monday after a poor run of results that have left the east London side languishing in the relegation zone. West Ham sack manager Slaven Bilic 
Sullivan believes Moyes, 54, is the perfect choice to steer the club to safety. 
“We need somebody with experience, knowledge of the Premier League and the players in it, and we believe David is the right man to turn things around and get the best out of the players at the club. 
“He is highly regarded and respected within the game, and will bring fresh ideas, organisation and enthusiasm.” 
Moyes has been out of management since he resigned from Sunderland at the end of last season, having failed to save them from relegation. 
Despite that, and an underwhelming stint in Spain with Real Sociedad, Sullivan and his co-chairman David Gold are backing him to help shore up a leaky defence as well as getting the best out of big-money summer signings Marko Arnautovic and Javier Hernandez. 
Bilic was let go following a chastening 4-1 loss to Liverpool at the London Stadium on Saturday that leaves them 18th in the table and facing a fight for Premier League survival. 
Bilic, who also played for West Ham, is the fourth Premier League managerial casualty of the season following the departures of Crystal Palace boss Frank de Boer, Leicester manager Craig Shakespeare and Everton’s Ronald Koeman.

posts.title: تعرف على إيرادات فيلم "الفندق" أمس
posts.text: تعرف على إيرادات فيلم "الفندق" أمس الثلاثاء 07/نوفمبر/2017 - 10:51 ص الفجر الفني حقق فيلم "الفندق" بطولة علا غانم، وأحمد بدير، ومحمد نجاتى، وإخراج عاطف شكرى، إيرادات بلغت 100 ألف جنيه، كما استطاع أن يحقق أمس، الاثنين، 17 ألف جنيه. الفيلم تدور أحداثه فى إطار درامى، حول الخيانة وتأثيرها على المجتمع، من خلال مجموعة من الأشخاص متواجدين فى أحد الفنادق، وتكتشف إحدى الزوجات أن زوجها على علاقة بفتاة تعمل بـ "الملهى الليلى" فى الفندق، إلا أن العمل لم يلق تجاوبا فى دور العرض من قبل رواد السينما، والفيلم يشارك فى بطولته حجاج عبد العظيم واللبنانية مروى وأحمد كرارة وممثل مسرح مصر إبرام سمير، ومحمد الصاوي وأحمد صادق، تأليف أسامة فهمى عبد الظاهر، وإخراج عاطف شكرى.

posts.author: Edward Dneprovoi (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: How Tiny Houses Work For Many Temporary Housing Needs
posts.text:
By Dennis Cooper 

A lot of people need to have some kind of comfortable but temporary housing out where there are no residences available. Also, it will provide with excellent places to stay and avoid the costs of putting up a real house in awkward locations. There are many travelers in Australia, or folks that are doing jobs in far flung places.

Shelter is a very basic commodity and in the state of Western Australia it is something vitally needed. Building engineers and experts have come out with units including Tiny Houses WA for the need. A unit is often colorful, have many efficient qualities providing much the same comfort as real homes, which may not be available in open locations here.

The state occupies a third of Australia, the western part that also has a lot of resources available. But the climate is arid, and the main cities could be on the coastline, while inland should be smaller cities and towns that are way stations in this immense space. Perth is the major urban center, and your unit could come from those outfits make it in this city.

Many Australians know that the Outback is a rare and beautiful thing. But they are also aware about its in hospitability to those who are not prepared for it when doing road trips and such, and RV units are not in much use here. Australians prefer their own home made products, and the houses in question actually work better here.

It could be towed by a small car or sedan, and using an SUV could make it work excellently. The unit is set on wheels and can be set up as a temporary, static house anywhere convenient. This means that you have an entire house with all the conveniences to use anywhere your work or travels could take you.

Your need is for simply parking it somewhere convenient, to uncouple its lines from the car and have it stand and be stable. There are attachments that will be basic and will come with any unit. Thus the home you have should be ready fast, and it can take out the necessary issues or work that are found when you camp out and need some good protection from the climate.

This country also has a lot of poisonous species in the wild, and camping out with average gear could be something that is not effective. RV is not going to work, too, because it is too cumbersome and has more need for gas. The trailers that are employed is something that provides more security and all the conveniences are available for all those things that are needed.

It will really be a small version of a house, and the interior is something that could have many things installed in smaller versions. Thus the furnishings could be complete and your pad will be fully furnished. You use it anywhere and actually provides more qualities than any comparable item.

A lot of attachments could be put in, from wireless satellites phones, satellite TV, radio units and WiFi. It is nothing if not really up to speed with all sorts of communication and domestic technologies. The materials are space age, and has minimal use of wood, which could degrade quickly under desert heat, and fiberglass and vinyl works better for insulation and durability.




About the Author:

thread.section_title: Periódico La Voz
thread.title: Reforzarán vigilancia durante “El Buen Fin”
thread.title_full: Reforzarán vigilancia durante “El Buen Fin”

posts.author: Staff / La Voz
posts.title: Reforzarán vigilancia durante “El Buen Fin”
posts.text:
Inicio Piedras Negras Reforzarán vigilancia durante “El Buen Fin” Reforzarán vigilancia durante “El Buen Fin” Por - 7 noviembre, 2017 
Corporaciones de seguridad acordaron reforzar la vigilancia durante los cuatro días del “Buen Fin” en Piedras Negras. 
El tema fue abordado durante la reciente reunión semanal de seguridad. 
“El Buen Fin” se realizará del viernes 17 al lunes 20 de noviembre de forma simultánea en todo el país. 
Se reforzarán los patrullajes en las zonas comerciales, principalmente en bancos, buscando inhibir cualquier delito. 
En el operativo especial de vigilancia participarán elementos de la Policía Preventiva, de la Policía Investigadora, Estatal e incluso elementos del Ejército Mexicano de forma coordinada. 
El acuerdo fue intensificar los recorridos, sin descuidar la vigilancia en la ciudad. 
Cabe destacar que los operativos se mantendrán hasta el mes de diciembre, fechas cuando existe un mayor circulante por el pago de aguinaldos y demás prestaciones. Compartir

thread.title_full: 今年の冬用にチェスターコートを買おう思い、お馴染みのAmazonを閲覧してい... - Yahoo!知恵袋

posts.author: niboshishoyu
posts.text:
amazonにもいろんな商品があります。
特に中国や韓国から出品してるマーケットプレイスのショップの場合、余裕の中華クオリティの商品を販売してる会社なんかもありますので、そのへんはレビューをきちんと読むなり、事前にショップに問い合わせするなどしてきちんと理解したうえで購入してください。
コート類ということだと、例えば、日本の商品には洗濯やクリーニングのときに参照する洗濯表示タグが付いてますが、海外からの商品の場合、こういったものがきちんとついてないと、クリーニングに出しても断られたり、いい加減な表示だった場合は、クリーニングの工場から戻ってきたら色や形が違ったり、って可能性なんかもあります。
また、少し負荷をかけたら破れたとか、そもそも縫い目が思いっきり曲がってたり、糸のほつれが目立つ商品でも中華クオリティでは「正常品」扱いのことも多いので、こういったリスクが怖いのなら、さっくりと日本のショップで自分で実際に見て選びましょう。

posts.title: اليوم..نظر جلسات قضية "فض اعتصام رابعة العدوية"
posts.text:
اليوم..نظر جلسات قضية "فض اعتصام رابعة العدوية" منذ 10 ساعة عدد القراءات: 310 
تواصل محكمة جنايات القاهرة، والمنعقدة بمعهد أمناء الشرطة بطرة، اليوم الثلاثاء 7 نوفمبر، نظر جلسات القضية المعروفة إعلاميًا بـ"فض اعتصام رابعة"، والتي يُحاكم فيها 732 شخصًا من مناهضي الانقلاب العسكري، أبرزهم الدكتور محمد بديع مرشد الإخوان وعصام العريان، ومحمد البلتاجي وصفوت حجازي، وأسامة ياسين وعاصم عبد الماجد وباسم عودة. 
وأبرز المعتقلين في القضية, مرشد جماعة الإخوان محمد بديع، وعصام العريان، وعبد الرحمن البر، وعاصم عبد الماجد، محمد البلتاجي، وصفوت حجازي، وأسامة ياسين، باسم عودة، طارق الزمر، عصام سلطان، أسامة محمد مرسي العياط، وجدي غنيم، أحمد محمد علي عارف، عمرو زكي محمد بمجمل 13 من قيادات الجماعة، بالإضافة إلى المصور الصحفي محمود شوكان. 
وأدعت نيابة العسكر، أن الوارد أسمائهم في لائحة الاتهام، متورطين في عدة تهم هزلية منها: تدبير تجمهر مؤلف من أكثر من 5 أشخاص بمحيط ميدان رابعة العدوية من شأنه أن يجعل السلم والأمن العام في خطر، الغرض منه الترويع والتخويف والتخريب والاتلاف العمدي للمباني والأملاك العامة واحتلالها بالقوة وقطع الطرق وتعمد تعطيل سير وسائل النقل البرية وتعريض سلامتها للخطر.

thread.section_title: 今日财经-财经频道-金融界
thread.title: 平安大华黄维：明年投资机会关注信息消费板块-财经频道-
thread.title_full: 平安大华黄维：明年投资机会关注信息消费板块-财经频道-金融界

posts.author: 中国证券网
posts.title: 平安大华黄维：明年投资机会关注信息消费板块-财经频道-
posts.text:
中国证券网讯（记者 安仲文） 平安大华 睿享文娱 基金经理 日前表示， A股市场 价值和 概念股 的分化在未来将会持续，价值投资进入了 黄金 时期。
黄维介绍，平安大华睿享文娱成立以来，一直坚守以企业盈利为核心，寻找具备广阔成长空间以及高行业景气度的产业，挖掘其中盈利增长确定的标的，实现了较好收益。他认为，监管层近两年所出台的一系列调整政策，使 资本市场 今年出现了非常大的变化，如IPO常态化和并购重组监管趋严，使到壳价值显著下降，主题炒作风气大减，市场更加注重企业盈利，今年业绩白马股获得非常好的投资收益，龙头企业溢价明显。今年以来，代表消费升级的白酒家电持续创出新高，代表制造升级的消费类电子、 新能源汽车 等板块也表现非常好；而不具备业绩支撑的主题性标的，则表现较差，如很多 创业板 的 中小盘 股。他认为，这种分化在未来将会持续。这将是国内资本市场的“新常态”，价值投资进入了黄金时期。
针对四季度的投资机会，黄维表示，希望寻找盈利改善同时估值还具备提升空间的主线，如 银行保险 等金融板块以及部分低估值的消费 蓝筹股 ，另外，会对明年的机会做布局，挖掘明年成长确定，同时具备估值切换空间的投资主线，如信息消费、新能源汽车、 医药 和 食品饮料 等。

thread.section_title: Sideriska siktet
thread.title: Flintskallarnas brofäste rasar samman
thread.title_full: Flintskallarnas brofäste rasar samman

posts.author: Seaward (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Flintskallarnas brofäste rasar samman
posts.text:
Stockholms styrande politiker - inte minst " Apple-Mogert " - kan känna sig riktigt dumma nu i sitt fjäskande för amerikanskt Storkapital. För att inte tala om regeringen Reinfeldt som dessförinnan lismande lade sig platt inför Facebook och lät dem etablera sig i Sverige - för vad? Några få sketna arbetstillfällen i Luleå! Sverige är ultraskyldigt till att världen mår dåligt. Materialism är en så daterad livsåskådning! 


DN skriver öppet om borgarnas vanskötsel av
Sverige! Vad är det som håller på att hända? 
När jag ser nyheter från det vidöppna råtthålet (Paradisläckan) så kan man tycka att västerlandet nu knakar under sin egen demoraliserade girighet. Jag kommer att tänka på den brittiska barnvisan om London Bridge som störtar samman, en traditionell trudelutt som också spritts till den forna brittiska kolonin Jamaica och som fick sig en rejäl remejk i slutet av 1970-talet. 

Den rasta-reggae som under 1970-talets andra hälft frodades och sedan dog - åtminstone kommersiellt - med Bob Marley innehöll många intressanta gräsrotsproduktioner som aldrig nådde den vite mannens öron. Ett mellanting utgjordes av gruppen CULTURE som "Sir" Richard Branson opportunistiskt kontrakterade efter en makalöst stark albumdebut lyhört uppsnappad av superkapitalisten Warner Brothers. Men mellan dessa två affärsuppgörelser hamnade en episk version av London Bridge Is Falling Down mellan stolarna. Baldhead Bridge , flintskallarnas bro, utgavs ursprungligen bara som illa pressad 12-tums vinylsingel på Jamaica. 

Culture featuring Ranking Joe: Baldhead Bridge (1977) 
Cultures tolkning av barnkammarrimmet var vild, både lekfull och argt anarkistisk. Bland det bästa gruppens ledare Joseph Hill fick till. Hör Baldhead Bridge på youTube och begrunda en lyssnares kommentar på värsta engelska rotvälskan när han citerar låttexten: 
"Inna burnin' ring ah fire. Natty ah go watch di baldhead dem jus a reel like wire." 
-That's real talk. Culture Foreva!!!! AH Big Tune Dis!!!! ("...i en brinnande eldsring. Vi rastamän kommer att betrakta flintskallarna där de kränger som upphettade stålvajrar") 

I rastareligionens föreställningsvärld är en flintskalle en ond och korrupt människa som tillhör Babylon, den vite mannens utsugarsystem. Eld är den ordinära symbolen för Guds vrede som kommer att drabba dessa materialistiska och oandliga vita människor som konsumerar inom ramen för förtryckarkulturen. 

Det mesta i den här religionen kommer ur fria tolkningar av Bibelberättelser, justerade för säga något till ättlingar av afrikaner som togs som slavar av de vita européerna. Sir Francis Drake är t.ex. inte en upptäcktsresande för Cultures sångare utan en vit djävul. Man kan förstå perspektivet. 

Flintskallarna är låga naturer som kontrasterar med rastafari-anhängarnas hårflätor, vilka omvittnar samma inre andliga styrka som hos den bibliske Simson. 
  
Kultplatta från 1976 med dj-rapparen I-Roy.
(okänd rastaman på omslaget)...   
Albumtiteln kontrasterar "de två vägarna"
och fortsätter på omslagets baksida.
Tydligen saknades foto på en vit människa
så en färgad flintskalle fick duga. Kanske
är budskapet att även svarta kan
välja den onda materialistiska vägen. 


Trots styrkan hade Simson en karaktärssvaghet och han lät en kvinna lura av honom hemligheten att styrkan satt i håret. En talande bild för den kvinnoförnedrande attityd man ibland märker i den här annars så rytmiskt fascinerande musiken. "Woman woman woman - the roooot of all evil" lärde sig de unga sångarna gny redan från tioårsåldern. "Control your daughters" soul-wailar en annan (men tillägger att syftet är att lära kvinnan gudfruktighet och inte bara utöva makt som om det hade ett egenvärde). 

Från den här bibliskt grundade misstron till kvinnans moraliska omdöme till den antireligiösa sexism som ses i R&B-videor är det bara ett kort steg - ytterligheterna kommer samman i samma objektifiering av kvinnan som antingen själslig fara eller också kroppsligt verktyg för den låga mannens hämningslösa lustar. Det är inte svårt att drar paralleller till den antika zodiaken där de tre Vattentecknen (Kräftan, Skorpionen och Fiskarna) ofta (men oriktigt) uppfattas som feminina. Sant är att Vatten tycks ha med det oandliga och blott naturliga livet och betecknar därför marknadskrafternas blinda begär efter mer (den Vegetativa Själen). Att i studien av ett större gäng vd:s upptäcka Månen i Fiskarna som en gemensam faktor påminde om detta. 
  
Det lutar åt att sångaren Joseph Hill hade rätt, även om han själv segnade ner och dog under en turné i Tyskland för ett antal år sedan. Panamadokumenten och så snart efter Paradisdokumenten tyder på att tiden tätnat och tvingar fram en bekännelse under galgen. De goda människorna - alla de maktlösa - kommer att kyligt åse hur den onde mannens kultur självdestruerar och dess ledare "kränger som stålvajrar" vartefter den skakiga övergångstiden "Armageddon" börjar ta fart... Kapitalismen kan inte reformeras, det här blir ett sammanbrott och sen en ren nystart med utifrån en ny modell som utgår från människan och inte kapitalet. 

Inte för inte är Vattenbärarens tecken symbol för hela människosläktet. Det är därför självberikandets princip Jungfrun som grundton (1a huset) ALLTID gnisslar mot Vattenbäraren som nu hamnar i sjätte husets "fiendeposition". Studera Fredrik Reinfeldts horoskop, liv och åsikter för ett perfekt exempel på en helt vilseledd själ. Ordföranden i Svenskt Näringsliv gav också en chockerande tydlig bild av just hur självtjänandet ser ut när det kontrasteras mot mänskligheten som en helhet (Vattenbäraren).  

Den här bloggen förefaller ha gått i mål under denna tid då Sverige-horoskopets solära ödescykel pekar rakt på landets sunkiga identitet - vår "onda" Sol i koppling med "ond" förmögenhet hos en grupp som inte är hela folket utan tvärtom enbart de gynnade och mäktiga (5e huset i nationalhoroskopet). Vem kan längre tveka över Vågen som den korrekta ascendenten från Sverige ? 

Jag valde denna i linje med att även britterna använder midnattstimman i brist på närmare uppgift. För Sveriges del gäller ett officiellt dekret om den nya Regeringsformen daterat den 28/2 1974, vilket för midnatt i Stockholm och den sideriska zodiaken ger "jämlika" Vågen.  

Denna jämlikhetsmyt har svenskarna trott på innan internet "släppte informationen fri" och alla kan se hur det i själva verket förhåller sig med jämlikheten i detta land. Det är precis samma fiktion som den "amerikanska drömmen" som heller inte är något annat än just en dröm.  

Samhällspyramiden kommer att falla och Farao falla i de uppretade massornas händer. Farao kommer att söka hålla stånd med polis och militär och säga orden "systemet kräver detta" allt oftare. Men säg den människa som kan spjärna emot när det är Fader Tid som vänder bladet?

thread.section_title: El blog de Tercera Euskadi
thread.title: Entrevista. Salcedo: "Tenemos equipo para estar más arriba, pero la liga está muy igualada"
thread.title_full: Entrevista. Salcedo: "Tenemos equipo para estar más arriba, pero la liga está muy igualada"

posts.author: Tercera Euskadi (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Entrevista. Salcedo: "Tenemos equipo para estar más arriba, pero la liga está muy igualada"
posts.text:
Koldo Salcedo Romero (03/05/1992) fue el héroe de la JD Somorrostro en la última jornada de liga. No en vano, fue el autor del gol de la victoria ante todo un Sestao River, tanto que llegaba en el tiempo de descuento y traía la locura al Malecón. Salcedo admite que "hay mucha ilusión" en el club, ya que el Somo está disputando su primera temporada en categoría nacional. Lógicamente, los de Muskiz quieren que éste no sea su único año en la división, por ello y para evitar problemas, Koldo explica que "para  estar tranquilos creo que 45 puntos estaría bien" para no sufrir. 


Pregunta: Victoria importante la que lograban ante un gallo como el Sestao River. ¿Qué balance hacen del triunfo? 
Respuesta: Victoria importantísima, que de cara al partido de la Cultu nos va ha permitir jugar con más tranquilidad y confianza. 
P: Llegaba un hueso a El Malecón y cosechaban un triunfo sufridísimo. No en vano, el tanto llegaba sobre la bocina… 
R: La verdad que nos pusieron las cosas difíciles, sobre todo en la primera parte, pero la segunda, creo que fue nuestra, incluso pudimos marcar antes. 
P: Gol precisamente anotado por Koldo Salcedo. Alegría doble, ¿no? 
R: Sí, alegría por el gol y por el minuto en el que fue, pero sobre todo por los tres puntos. 
P: ¡Segunda victoria consecutiva que hace que el Somorrostro abra un pequeño hueco respecto a los puestos de descenso! 
R: Nos han venido bien estas dos victorias, pero veo la categoría muy igualada, tenemos que seguir en esta línea. 

"Nos han venido bien estas dos victorias, tenemos que seguir en esta línea" 
P: Son 15 puntos los que atesoran actualmente. ¿Qué balance se hace de este primer tercio del campeonato desde el club? 
R: La sensación es que tenemos equipo para estar más arriba, pero como te dicho antes, la liga esta muy igualada. 
P: Además, será una temporada importante en el club, ya que es el debut del Somorrostro en categoría nacional. ¿Se nota esto en el vestuario? 
R: Sin duda. Aunque tengamos jugadores que llevan tiempo jugando en esta categoría, hay mucha ilusión. 
P: Lo cierto es que están protagonizando un arranque con subidas y bajadas. Empezaron encadenando seis jornadas sin perder, después llegaron cuatro derrotas, ahora dos triunfos consecutivos… ¿A qué se debe esto? 
R: Creo que hubo partidos que merecimos más, pero esta es una categoría difícil en la que cualquier despiste te mata. Pasamos la mala racha y ahora solo pensamos en seguir esta línea. 

"Hubo partidos que merecimos más, pero esta es una categoría difícil en la que cualquier despiste te mata" 
P: Tuvimos la oportunidad de charlar con Belmonte y tenía claro que el objetivo es la permanencia. ¿Con quién cree que estarán luchando por ella? 
R: Todavía queda mucha liga y los equipos no regalan nada. Aunque nosotros sólo miramos lo nuestro. 
P: Además, los arrastres que se podrían generar podrían causar más problemas. ¿Cuál es la cifra de puntos que se debe alcanzar para estar tranquilos? 
R: Para estar tranquilos creo que 45 puntos estaría bien. 
P: Para llegar a ella, afrontan una salida muy complicada, ya que visitan a la Cultu. ¿Cómo ve este partido? 
R: Difícil, como todos. Pero creo que jugando como sabemos, tenemos nuestras opciones. 
P: Tabira, campo complicado. ¿Qué deberán hacer para sacar algo positivo de Durango? 
R: Jugar serios y concentrados, intentando aprovechar las ocasiones que tengamos. 
P: ¿Qué tendrán que tener en cuenta para parar a la Cultu? ¿Cuáles cree que son sus puntos fuertes? 
R: Cerrar bien entre líneas y con ayudas permanentes, ya que por dentro acumulan mucha gente y técnicamente son buenos. 
P: Hablábamos antes del partido del River, ahora Cultural y posteriormente Santurtzi. ¿Se puede decir que es el "Tourmalet" particular de la temporada? 
R: La verdad que son partidos complicados, pero no nos vamos a arrugar ante nadie, saldremos a ganar. 
P:Ese partido en San Jorge, entendemos, que será especial para usted, ¿no? 
R: Sí, vuelvo a la que fue mi casa, con amigos y recuerdos muy bonitos. 
P: Una última directa, ¿seguiremos viendo al Somorrostro el año que viene en Tercera? 
R:  Sin ninguna duda.

posts.author: yaya2017
posts.title: shoulders; was capaciou
posts.text:
In the span of one NBA season, Kevin Durant went from being one of the most unanimously-liked players in the NBA to being one of the most polarizing figures in the league, and it was all because of the fact that he joined a Golden State Warriors team that went 73-9 the previous season and followed that season up by winning the NBA title with Durant leading the way.Naturally, the group of NBA fans who have been giving Durant Nike Air Huarache Femme grief have been loud about it, and those gripes haven't fallen on deaf ears. Nike is going to Nike Air Max Tavas Damen release a special edition PE release of his KD 10 line of sneakers in commemoration of the Golden State Warriors' title victory last season and while the shoes themselves look relatively normal from the outside, things get interesting once you look at what's on the inside。As you can see, Nike got really creative with the insole design here. Written in black are all of the negative things that we've seen associated with Durant. From "They didn't need him to win," to "Bandwagon," to "KowarD," and they even threw in the classic "Blew a 3-1 lead" meme that predated Durant joining the Warriors. It's all there to read in black ink.However, they clearly want you to focus what's written in gold ink: One sole has "16-1," emblazoned on it, which was Nike Air Max 1 Womens Golden State's record in the playoffs on their way to the title victory last season. The other Moncler Cappotti Donne Nero sole has Durant's impressive stat lines for the five games of the 2017 NBA Finals, and proudly declares that he was indeed the 2017 NBA Finals MVP.
So it's clear that both Nike and Durant have heard the criticisms loud and clear, and it's also clear that they want to focus on the success more than the criticisms. This also isn't the first time that they've used the canvas of the KD 10 shoe to send a message to the critics. The "Red Velvet" version of the KD 10 was officially described by Nike as "celebrating the smoothest player in the game," but it was also another veiled response to a veiled diss from Russell Westbrook back when Durant made the decision to leave the Oklahoma City Thunder.Knowing that there's a history of this, it Nike Air Max Command Damen shouldn't come as a shock that they decided to use the new KD 10 to send a message of sorts. Still, Nike Air Max 90 Womens Pink it's not every day that you see something like this come down the pike and it's not every day that you see one of the best players in the world use a shoe to address the haters. That's the world that we're living in now, and the basketball world clearly belongs to Kevin Durant at the moment.The homely old English hunting coat is a fashion wild card. “Field jackets are a sociological curiosity,” notes Alan Flusser, New York City custom tailor and author of Style and the Man. “There is an involuted status now to wearing something identifiable as an outdoor utility jacket over something dressy.” Which explains why field jackets these days are offered not Nike Air Max 90 Damen Schwarz only by the usual purveyors of traditional, rugged jackets, like J Barbour and Sons, but www.alessiolaudando.it also by fashion designers from Loro Piana to Ralph Lauren. Their versions, naturally, are fine and pricey and aimed at people highly unlikely to stuff a dead bird into the pocket.The field jackets worn from London to Los Angeles are in fact the result of a kind of an elaborate cultural Darwinism that incorporates successful elements from the realms of hunting, fishing, riding, military gear, and technical sportswear. Few Western styles have transcended clothing trends longer or had more complex origins.
“You wouldn’t call them costumes exactly,” notes Marion Maggiolo, owner of Anglophile outfitter Horse Country Saddlery in Warrenton, Va., “but you are buying into history. This is clothing that has evolved over time, so it works.”That means Nike Air Max 90 Femme Bleu when you drive downtown wearing your Barbour jacket—a Range Rover or Mercedes Gel?ndewagen Nike Air Max 90 Damen Pink would complete the picture—you are referencing a past that goes back at least as far as the ancient hunters of the Aleutian Islands. The Aleuts’ answer to their outdoor conditions were lightweight parkas of sewn-together whale and seal intestines. They were both weatherproof and to some extent breathable, pretty much the twin goals of outerwear manufacturers ever since.It is hard to say exactly when fashion entered the picture. Hunting as a recreation associated with the nobility—as opposed to being for daily survival—probably elevated in status some forms of clothing from the outset. The common ancestor of today’s English field wear is probably the tweed Norfolk jacket, which became popular among sportsmen in the mid-19th century, a coat Adidas NMD Dames that provided ample room for movement in the shoulders; was capacious, with easy-access pockets Moncler Coats Womens for cartridges and other gear; and featured a sewn-in belt to keep out the cold.By the 1890s, according to Gentleman’s Gazette, “dress codes became more relaxed,” and “young chaps were seen wearing Norfolk jackets in town,” which, of course, means that the current crop of urban field jackets has a long tradition.

thread.title: What you need to know about travel insurance
thread.title_full: What you need to know about travel insurance

posts.author: SUPPLIED CONTENT
posts.title: What you need to know about travel insurance
posts.text:
What you need to know about travel insurance Travel  15am / SUPPLIED CONTENT Picture: AP Photo/Vincent Thian 
What’s your biggest fear when travelling? Your trip being cancelled or cut short? Losing your luggage? Getting seriously ill? Being in an accident? An act of terror? Natural disasters? “Many of us don’t like to think about these possibilities, but they can and do happen. For this reason, regardless of whether you’re going on a quick domestic trip or an overseas expedition, travel insurance is a must,” says Grant Sandham, Premier Hotels & Resorts’ Group Sales & Marketing Manager. He answers some common questions about this travel essential: What does travel insurance cover? 
There are a variety of packages to suit every type of traveller, but most cover hospital bills payable in foreign currencies, costs incurred due to the unexpected cancellation of trips, lost luggage, delayed flights, personal liability and accidental injuries requiring medical intervention. Some insurers also offer adventure cover, designed for accidents that can happen during risky activities like scuba diving and skiing, while others have policies for seniors over a certain age. 
When should I buy travel insurance? 
Make sure you purchase your cover as soon as you’ve paid for your ticket - preferably on the same day. Should you need to cancel your trip before your travel date, you can then recover some, if not all, of the costs you have forked out. Where can I get travel insurance? 
Travel insurance can be bought from insurance companies, brokers, travel agents, tour operators or even credit card providers. How much should I pay? 
Shop around to find the best deal for your budget. The cost of travel insurance generally depends on the duration of your journey, the level of cover you need and your age, but may be lower for business or group trips, depending on the insurer. How do I claim in the event of an incident? 
Should misfortune strike, contact your insurer immediately before paying any bills and they will advise you on your next steps. “While buying travel insurance usually isn’t on top of everyone’s to-do lists before a trip, it can give you peace of mind during your time away and may even save you some money, not to mention your life,” concludes Sandham.

♠ 및 인근까지 차량접근 가능하고 대중교통 수단인 버스정류장이 인근에 소재하며,운행빈도 등으로 보아 제반 교통여건은 보통시 됨.
♠ 기호(1,3): 2필 일단의 부정형 토지로서 `공업용 건부지 및 진입도로 등`으로 이용중임.기호(2,5,6): 공히 남동하향 급경사를 이룬 부정형 및 삼각형의 토지로서 `법면지상태` 이며, 기호(5,6) 일부 지상에 소나무 및 활잡목 등이 자생하고 있음.기호(4): 부정형의 완경사 토지로서 현황`도로`로 이용중임.
♠ 기호(1) 토지는 기호(3)토지(진입도로)를 통하여 북동측으로 로폭 약4미터 정도의 포장도로와 연계됨.기호(2,5,6) 토지는 공히 지적상 맹지임. 기호(4) 토지는 기호(3)토지(진입도로)를 통하여 북동측으로 로폭 약4미터 정도의 포장도로와 연계됨.
♠ 기호(1,6): 공히 도시지역,자연녹지지역(경기도고시(2006-47)),가축사육제한구역(일부 제한지역),준보전산지((문의:산림녹지과)),성장관리권역임.기호(2): 도시지역,자연녹지지역(2012-09-28),자연녹지지역(경기도고시(2006-47)),가축사육제한구역(일부제한지역),도로구역,임업용산지(2013-04-29)((문의:산림녹지과)),성장관리권역임. 기호(3): 도시지역,자연녹지지역(경기도고시(2006-47)),가축사육제한구역(일부제한지역),도로구역,준보전산지((문의:산림녹지과)),성장관리권역임. 기호(4): 도시지역,자연녹지지역(2012-09-28),자연녹지지역(경기도고시(2006-47)),가축사육제한구역(일부제한지역),도로구역,임업용산지(2013-04-29)((문의:산림녹지과)),준보전산지((문의:산림녹지과)),성장관리권역임. 기호(5): 도시지역,자연녹지지역(2012-09-28),자연녹지지역(경기도고시(2006-47)),가축사육제한구역(일부제한지역),임업용산지(2013-04-29))((문의:산림녹지과)),준보전산지((문의:산림녹지과)),성장관리권역임.
♠ `평가의견1-3항 및 사진참조`
♠ 기호(3)토지는 지목이 `공장용지`이나, 현황`진입도로 등`임.기호(4)토지는 지목이 `임야`이나, 현황`도로`임.
♠ 기호(7)일반철골조(H-Bram:488
♠300mm,층고:6m) 스라브지붕 3층건으로외벽: 샌드위치판넬 마감, 커튼월, 일부 외장강화유리 마감 등내벽: 벽지도배(사무실,식당), EPS판넬붙임 마감 등바닥: 아스타일(사무실), 전도성타일붙임(공장) 마감 등천정: 텍스마감(사무실)창호: 알미늄새시창호 및 헹거도어 등
♠ 기호(7)지층: 식당,공장,물탱크실,승강기실,창고,계단실 등1층: 공장,홀,창고,승강기실,계단실,화장실 등2층: 공장,홀,창고,승강기실,계단실,화장실 등3층: 사무실,홀,휴게실,계단실,화장실 등으로 이용중임.
♠ 위생설비, 급배수시설, 공조시설 등이 되어 있으며, 시스템방식에 의한 냉난방설비(3층:사무실)임.
♠ 별첨`지적 및 건물개황도`와 같이 제시외건물(ㄱ)-(ㄷ)이 소재하며, 규모 및 용도로보아 본건에 미치는 영향은 없을것으로 사료됨.

thread.section_title: Mirror Arts Photography
thread.title: Thailand Fotografen Packliste
thread.title_full: Thailand Fotografen Packliste

posts.author: Sylvia
posts.title: Thailand Fotografen Packliste
posts.text:
Wenn ihr unsere Thailand Fotografen Packliste lest, sind wir gerade schon auf dem Weg zum Flughafen. Drei Wochen mit Rucksack und ohne Plan gehts los ins Abenteuer. Natürlich dabei, wie immer unser Kamera + Videoequipment. Wir haben uns fest vorgenommen, diesmal auch wieder Videos zu produzieren. Dafür nehmen wir unser DJI Equipment bestehend aus OSMO und Mavic mit. Um euch einen kleinen Überblick zu verschaffen, haben wir eine kurze Packliste erstellen, an der ihr euch inspirieren lassen könnt.

Fotografen Packliste Manfrotto BeFree Stativ Apple Macbook Pro DJI OSMO + 3 Akkus DJI Mavic Pro + 2 Akkus GoPro 4 mit Wasserhülle+Schwimmer Olympus PEN PL-7 Canon 5D MKiii + 4 Akkus Canon 16-35mm Canon 24-70mm Canon 50mm Diverse Speicherkarten im Etui Filter für Canon & Mavic 
Wir haben versucht unsere Ausrüstung so klein wie möglich zu halten. Lacht jetzt nicht, das ist unser ernst! Normalerweise darf noch eine Canon 70D und weitere Objektive mit. Letztes Jahr in Portugal hatten wir sogar die Phantom und eine Glidecam dabei (no words). Diesmal wollten wir uns absprechen damit einer Video & einer Fotos macht. Beim letzten Urlaub mussten wir nämlich teilweise doppelte Fotos aussortieren, was unnötig Arbeit verursacht. Da wir ja am selben Ort stehen, macht das nicht wirklich Sinn. Auch haben wir diesmal auf das 70-200mm verzichtet das wir bisher immer unnötig mitgeschleppt hatten. (Ausser Simon schmuggelt es am Ende wieder rein, wenn noch Platz ist. Wir werden sehen).
Das Notebook ist hautpsächlich gegen unsere Paranoia das die Speicherkarten voll sein könnten und zum Filme schauen falls der Flieger keine Fernseher hat (Worst-worst-worst case der hin und wieder wirklich eintritt. 16h ohne Filme sind der Tod). Da haben wir überlegt vielleicht das iPad zu nehmen und zur Not eine externe Festplatte mitzunehmen. Mal sehen ob wir uns dazu noch hinreissen lassen.
Wir sind mit dem Rucksack unterwegs und sollten unter 30kg Totalgewicht für beide bleiben. Die Inlandsflüge in Thailand sind meistens auf 15kg pro Person beschränkt wenn man halbwegs günstig davonkommen will. Also haben wir zumindest einen kleinen Aufhänger an den wir uns halten sollten. Vielleicht werden wir auch das eine oder andere Pärchen ansprechen am Strand, dafür wollen wir dann natürlich auch Ausrüstung dabei haben.
Hier gibts übrigens noch ein Video als wir für Kuba gepackt haben:

 
Wenn ihr wissen wollt, was im Endeffekt in den Rucksäcken war – folgt uns doch über Instagram oder bleibt hier am Blog. Es wird dann bestimmt jede Menge Thailand Beiträge geben. 


Der Beitrag Thailand Fotografen Packliste erschien zuerst auf Mirror Arts Photography .

posts.text: 几年前逛京东还不是那么的信任京东，现在信赖首选京东，默默哒一直看着它一年一年发展的越来越好，心里也在为京东发展壮大而加油打气。为什么我喜欢京东购物，因为可以当天买自己喜欢的商品，明天就可以到达客户的家中，为什么我所有的评价都相同，因为在京东买的东西太多太多，商品积累的太多没有评价，最佩服的，还是京东物流，有时晚上11点前动动手指，购买的商品，第二天上午就送到单位或者家里，还可以刷卡付款。自营的商品挺有保证，售后，有问题打专属客服热线。客服很赞，一句话的事儿，直接上门取件退，上门更换新商品，家电有价保，一个月退货，半年换货，实体店儿弱爆了，根本没有竞争力与京东相提并论；比老家的商铺街上的价格省了一大截票子哈，宝宝平时基本不逛街，在家逛京东商城就能买到合意的超值商品，有些明显比超市还划算，而且还一模一样的吃喝生活用品哟，小宝贝们快来选购吧！既省钱，又节省时间，永远支持信誉商家《京东》。

thread.title_full: Global B2B Marketplace, iiSnap Helping Manufacturers Sell Internationally with First to Market Buying Model

posts.author: morningstar.com
posts.title: Global B2B Marketplace, iiSnap Helping Manufacturers Sell Internationally with First to Market Buying Model
posts.text:
Global B2B Marketplace, iiSnap Helping Manufacturers Sell Internationally with First to Market Buying Model
iiSnap, the Western Australia based start-up company is disrupting the traditional distribution model, enabling manufacturing companies to sell directly to retailers and gain significant savings by removing barriers to entry. iiSnap has introduced a first to market buying model that forecast demand and group retailers orders to meet suppliers MOQ (minimum order quantity) goal.
“As Retail becomes more and more challenging for businesses; we want to give retailers the opportunity to have a new edge over the big competitors by providing them access to higher margins and exciting products" stated Ami Barda, founder of iiSnap.
"We also want to empower smaller businesses because 80% of the buying force in the market of consumer products purchasing is small to medium enterprises."
iiSnap has partnered with some of the leading companies in the supply chain industry to offer end to end buying and selling solutions that includes secure payment processing, quality control, fulfillments, and shipping.
Products will be available across a wide range of categories including lifestyle tech, kids & family, Outdoors tech, wearables, fitness and leisure as well as audio and entertainment.
iiSnap mainly focuses on tech and design-centric brands with unique product offering, companies currently on-boarding the site will be able to sell directly to specialty retailers in their industry with the aim to have a passionate and motivated retailer behind the sale process.
The company has managed to automate the complicated procurement process to provide SME's buyers with a transparent and seamless buying experience that saves them time and money.
iiSnap offers low barriers to entry for vendors with no subscription or membership fees but simply straightforward marketplace fees on orders placed on the platform.
“The aim was always to develop a win-win scenario; No sales? No Fees. Our aim is to bring the margins back to the retailers, the innovative products to the consumers, and the profits back to the manufacturers” says Barda.
iiSnap is open to new suppliers applications and buyers interested can request an invitation on the company home page

thread.title: Duminy to captain Cobras in T20 Challenge
thread.title_full: Duminy to captain Cobras in T20 Challenge

posts.author: Zaahier Adams
posts.title: Duminy to captain Cobras in T20 Challenge
posts.text:
Duminy to captain Cobras in T20 Challenge Domestic Cricket / 7 November 2017, 11:09am / Zaahier Adams JP Duminy is excited and also a little nervous as he takes over the reigns as captain for the T20 Challenge. Photo: BackpagePix 
Having captained the Proteas and the Delhi Daredevils before, JP Duminy will finally get the opportunity to lead his home town Cape Cobras in this season’s T20 Challenge. Although regular Cobras skipper Dane Piedt has performed admirably under often trying circumstances over the past eight months, it is only logical for Duminy to take over the leadership reins now that he is available for all forms of white-ball domestic cricket. Duminy, 33, retired from Test cricket earlier this year to focus solely on limited-overs in the lead-up to the 2019 World Cup in England. “It is going to be a nice responsibility,” Duminy exclusively told Independent Media on Tuesday. “It is going to be different to the leading the Proteas and more like in the IPL. In the national team most players know their games and what they need to do, but in franchise cricket there are quite a number of young players that often need guidance, so that’s always an exciting challenge.” — Zaahier Adams (@ZaahierAdams) November 7, 2017 Duminy, though, will at least have the experience and quality of fellow Proteas Hashim Amla, Temba Bavuma, Vernon Philander and Dane Paterson alongside him when the Cobras open their T20 Challenge campaign against the Dolphins in the first match of a double-header at SuperSport Park in Centurion on Sunday. Duminy was meant to lead the Cape Town Knight Riders in the inaugural Global T20 League before it was postponed until next season, and the classy left-hander believes the new challenge with the Cobras has come at just the right time. “I was really excited to lead the Knight Riders and building a new brand in Cape Town, but that has to wait for a little while now and it was quite disappointing. “However, growing up in Cape Town, playing my first game for Western Province when I was still at school, I never thought I would captain the Cobras. It wasn’t in my make-up at the time. But having now learnt from great leaders, not just cricket captains, as I have grown older has really got me excited about leading the team I grew up with. I am actually quite nervous,” Duminy chirped.
IOL Sport

posts.text:
BAGNOLO MELLA: I FANTI RACCONTANO LA “GRANDE GUERRA” AGLI STUDENTI DELLE MEDIE 

Gli studenti della Scuola Secondaria di Primo Grado di Bagnolo Mella potranno conoscere la “Grande Guerra” dal punto di osservazione privilegiato che verrà proposto loro dai vertici dell’Associazione Fanti d’Italia. Le mattine di sabato 18 e sabato 25 novembre gli scolari bagnolesi verranno suddivisi in due gruppi per seguire una “lezione” davvero particolare e assai ricca di motivi di interesse. Grazie anche alla collaborazione instaurata con la locale Amministrazione Comunale, il presidente nazionale dell’Associazione Fanti d’Italia, Gianni Stucchi, coadiuvato dal segretario nazionale Vincenzo Ferrero e dal presidente della sezione bagnolese, Stefano Signorini, racconterà le caratteristiche e le prerogative della Prima Guerra Mondiale. Un’analisi approfondita ed attenta, che sarà accompagnata ed intervallata dai suggestivi brani musicali di Beethoven e di Mozart. Dall’inizio delle ostilità passando attraverso alcune delle battaglie più celebri della storia (Caporetto, Vittorio Veneto e quella sul Piave), si giungerà sino alla liberazione di Trento, Trieste e Udine completando il tutto con la citazione dedicata al milite ignoto. Un lungo viaggio nella storia e nella guerra più famosa e sanguinosa del secolo scorso che offrirà una valida riflessione agli studenti dei giorni nostri e agli uomini del futuro. Un incontro che mira anche a valorizzare quelli che sono da sempre i punti di riferimento dell’Associazione Fanti d’Italia, che nel proprio statuto mira a perpetuare la memoria di tanti fanti caduti nell’adempimento del dovere e di tante imprese eroiche legate a quei valori di patria, di sacrificio e di impegno che rappresentano una “lezione” da trasmettere agli studenti di tutti i tempi.

thread.title: iPhone bug frustrates users typing ‘i’ — more like ‘A?phone’ – California Process Service (626)230-3137
thread.title_full: iPhone bug frustrates users typing ‘i’ — more like ‘A?phone’ – California Process Service (626)230-3137

posts.title: iPhone bug frustrates users typing ‘i’ — more like ‘A?phone’ – California Process Service (626)230-3137
posts.text:
iPhone bug frustrates users typing ‘i’ — more like ‘A?phone’ November 6, 2017 casop 
NEW YORK — iPhone? More like A?phone. 
Some Apple users have discovered a bug that automatically corrects the lower-case letter “i” to “A” and a question mark symbol. 
The issue appears to impact iPhone users on its most recent mobile software, iOS 11.1. The new software launched last Tuesday and features hundreds of new emoji. 
Not surprisingly, the bug is frustrating many Apple users. 
“WHY does my #iphone keep changing the letter “i” to I ?! HELP,” tweeted one user. 
“I had to turn off my auto correct which is super annoying,” wrote another iPhone user on Apple’s discussion forum . 
Although Apple hasn’t officially updated the software to correct the issue, it suggested on its website a way for users to fix it themselves. Users can access the Keyboard settings and add a text replacement. 
“For Phrase, type an upper-case ‘I,’” Apple explains. “For Shortcut, type a lower-case ‘i.’” 
Apple said in its support post the error will be fixed in a future software update. 
The highly anticipated iPhone X hit stores worldwide on Friday . The device, which starts at $999, touts facial recognition technology, an edge-to-edge screen and a powerful camera. 
But some users reportedly had trouble activating their new devices due to issues with mobile carriers’ activation servers. 
It’s not uncommon for new software to have bugs. A previous version of iOS 11 contained an issue with the calculator app and miscalculated the result of 1+2+3. 
Apple has not responded to a request for comment.

thread.title: 超50城发布租赁政策 租住市场生变租户选择增加-财经频道-
thread.title_full: 超50城发布租赁政策 租住市场生变租户选择增加-财经频道-金融界

posts.author: 新华网
posts.title: 超50城发布租赁政策 租住市场生变租户选择增加-财经频道-
posts.text:
十九大报告提出，加快建立多主体供给、多渠道保障、租购并举的住房制度，让全体人民住有所居。
据中原地产不完全统计，截至目前，全国发布租赁新政策的城市已超50个，包括国家确定的12个租赁试点城市。各地陆续出台的扶持政策吸引各类市场主体竞逐。伴随高中低端多元化产品的持续入市，租赁市场的供求关系以及各方心态已开始发生变化，租金可议价的空间扩大，租户的选择日渐增多。
鼓励租赁企业做“大” 金融支持也很给力
从各地出台的政策看，培育和发展专业化房屋租赁企业已成共识，也就是企业要做得够“大”。一些城市为加大对住房租赁企业支持力度，在金融支持方面也很给力，以缓解租赁机构“融资难”。
――鼓励住房租赁企业机构化、规模化发展。
沈阳提出，开展住房租赁业务的房地产开发企业，可享受降低商品房预售许可门槛、降低商品房预售资金监管比例等鼓励政策；合肥、厦门和郑州均表示支持房屋租赁企业通过合并重组做大做强；杭州和成都表示，将扶持发展专业化住房租赁企业。
不少城市明确提出培育规模企业的量化目标。如杭州提出，选择15家左右具有一定规模、品牌的住房租赁企业作为专业化住房租赁试点。成都和沈阳均提出，力争到2020年，培育和发展机构化、规模化租赁企业不低于50家。
――加大对住房租赁企业的金融支持。
上海、杭州和武汉提出推进房地产投资信托基金（REITs）试点政策；成都和杭州提出支持金融机构向符合条件的住房租赁企业提供发行债券、票据、不动产证券化产品等服务。
近日，首单央企租赁住房类REITs产品获上海 证券交易 所审议通过。 中信银行 ( 行情 601998 , 诊股 )、 建设银行 ( 行情 601939 , 诊股 )、 中国银行 ( 行情 601988 , 诊股 )等多家银行近期也陆续宣布给予住房租赁金融支持。
租赁市场成“蓝海” 开发商、机构大举涌入
房地产开发商、中介机构、物业服务机构、国有租赁公司、互联网企业……各地陆续出台的扶持政策，引得等各类企业竞逐租赁“蓝海”。
目前不少房地产开发企业正从单一的开发销售向租售并举模式转变。据克而瑞研究中心统计，全国排名前30位的开发商中，已有60%以上开始布局长租公寓市场，旭辉领寓、龙湖冠寓、万科泊寓等已形成一定规模。如，龙湖冠寓10月在上海宣布开业9家门店。龙湖集团副总裁兼冠寓公司CEO韩石表示，龙湖冠寓2017年将在全国布局16个一二线城市，预计开业房量逾1.5万间。
一些房地产开发企业将新建商品房项目中长期持有的部分房源用于市场租赁。上海龙湖总经理温介邦透露，目前在上海获得的20个项目中，有6个是上海龙湖自持的物业项目。
旭辉领寓提出5年内集中式公寓数量将超过20万间；万科则计划年内在全国布局10万间长租公寓……
龙头房屋中介也开始拓展租赁业务。我爱我家旗下长租公寓品牌“相寓”，房源从10万套增长至16万套。链家旗下“自如”的房源管理规模也已突破40万间，年租金收入约90亿元。
或“零溢价”拿地，或与长租公寓运营企业合作开发，作为新生力量的国有租赁企业也加入了这个市场； 阿里 巴巴和京东等 电商 则利用 大数据 优势，与地方政府合作开发官方租赁平台，探索“信用租房”。
长租公寓持续入市 租户更挑剔选择更多元
市场主体的增加，促进了长租公寓的持续供应，租户的选择也日益多元；住宅销售市场“走低”，也使得存量房源“由售转租”，这一系列变化正在改变市场各方的心态。
上海房屋租赁指数办公室调查发现，上海住房租赁市场开始呈现分化。部分区域的待租房源明显高于新增需求，不少传统民房出现降价续约的现象，而中高端需求热点则逐渐转移至长租公寓。
中原地产数据显示，上海中高端租赁房源的平均成交周期由2周延长至1个月，不少房东主动降租金5%以上。“业主心态的转变带来了租赁市场房源供应的增加，从而缓解了市场的供需矛盾，平抑了租 金价 格。”旭辉领寓国际副总裁高杰说。
一边是市场供应增加，另一边租户的眼光也开始变得更挑剔。记者走访发现，新增租客中除了暂缓购房者外，也有追求租赁消费升级的人群。
“虽然租金高了点，但长租公寓配有安保系统、专职管家、保洁、家居维护、代收快递等服务，还有定期的休闲娱乐文化活动”，租住上海柚米国际社区的自由投资人张君朝说，“这是传统民宅提供不了的。”

posts.author: Vernon Pillay
posts.title: LIVE: AEEI releases its financial year-end results
posts.text:
LIVE: AEEI releases its financial year-end results Business Report / 7 November 2017, 11:09am / Vernon Pillay African Equity Empowerment Investments Limited’s (AEEI) group chief executive officer Khalid Abdulla. 
CAPE TOWN - African Equity Empowerment Investments Limited has reported strong year-end performance, with 111% increase in operating profit. 
Highlights 
- Profit before tax increased by 136% from R288m to R681m 
- Headline earnings per share increased by 120% from 43.13 cents to 94.89 cents 
- Earnings per share increased by 120% from 44.09 cents to 97.10 cents 
- Operating profit increased by 111% from R310m to R655m 
- Net asset value increased by 100% from R1bn to R2bn- Total assets increased by 65% from R1.7bn to R2.8bn 
- Revenue increased by 43% from R736m to R1 052m 
- Net cash generated from operating activities increased to R80m 
- Final dividend declaration of 5.50 cents per share to shareholders 
Group and CEO, Khalid Abdulla said “Looking ahead, AEEI has a solid balance sheet and our cash flow has improved. Our business model remains on a firm growth path, investing in other companies and market strategies, as well as investing in our own people who will assist us in continuing to deliver long-term value for all our stakeholders including our shareholders. 
“This year has been excellent for its organic growth, continuous reinvestment, and strategic acquisitions, building on to our objective of a sustainable high-growth Company with shareholder value growth in line with our Vision 202 Vision.” 
Watch the live event Here : 
- BUSINESS REPORT ONLINE

thread.section_title: 《中时电子报》财经
thread.title: 出乎意料！iX首周末市场渗透率竟不到i6一半
thread.title_full: 出乎意料！iX首周末市场渗透率竟不到i6一半

posts.author: 卢宏奇
posts.title: 出乎意料！iX首周末市场渗透率竟不到i6一半
posts.text:
卢宏奇 
iPhone X正式开卖后，在全球都传出售罄消息，苹果高阶主管称预订量缔造新猷，并预期本季销售相当乐观。不过，根据市调机构Localytics统计显示，iPhone X首周末市场渗透率仅0.93%，相当于iPhone 7、iPhone 6s水准，接近于更旧款的iPhone 5s，大概只有iPhone 6一半，并未创下歷史新高纪录。 
这项以7000万支iPhone为调查样本的报告也指出，目前使用中的苹果手机里，iPhone X已经达到0.93%的市占率。其他用户使用量最多的几款手机分别为iPhone 7、iPhone 6S、iPhone 6、iPhone 7 Plus，占有率依次为19.7%、18.58%、16.77%、13.83%，其余款式的占有率则不到一成。 
根据美国科技新闻网站《AppleInsider》报导，Localytics在报告中表示，虽然无法统计iPhone X首周末的具体销售数据，但能从渗透分布情况衡量手机热销程度。统计显示，iPhone X首周末后市场渗透率仅0.93%，不及iPhone 6约2%的歷史纪录一半水准，iPhone 8、iPhone 8 Plus渗透率也只有0.3%、0.4%。 
另一家美国科技市场研究公司Slice日前发布报告，以消费者电子邮件数据推估，iPhone X预订规模约iPhone 6的1.25倍左右。当然，预订规模与首周末发售量、首周末市场渗透率并非同样一个概念。目前苹果官方尚未披露iPhone X首周末的发售量或全球预订总量，但苹果已要求代工厂加快生產，将发货时间缩短1个星期。 
(中时电子报)

사우스엔드는 홈에서는 언더가 많은 팀입니다.

4번이 언더입니다.

다만 이 경기는 두 팀이 동기를 가지고 있고,
승리하기 위한 두 팀의 매치라 오버로 픽합니다.
